org.anchoranalysis.overlay.object.scaled

Interface ScaledOverlayCreator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FromMask

    public interface ScaledOverlayCreator
    Creates a scaled version of ObjectMask to use as an overlay.
    Author:
    Owen Feehan

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ObjectWithProperties createScaledObject(DrawOverlay overlayWriter, ObjectWithProperties unscaled, double scaleFactor, Object originalObject, Dimensions dimensionsScaled, BinaryValuesByte bv)
      Creates a scaled-version of the object to use as an overlay..

    • Method Detail

      • createScaledObject

        ObjectWithProperties createScaledObject(DrawOverlay overlayWriter,
                                        ObjectWithProperties unscaled,
                                        double scaleFactor,
                                        Object originalObject,
                                        Dimensions dimensionsScaled,
                                        BinaryValuesByte bv)
                                 throws CreateException
        Creates a scaled-version of the object to use as an overlay..
        Parameters:
        overlayWriter - what writes an overlay onto a raster
        unscaled - unscaled object-mask
        scaleFactor - how much to scale by (e.g. 0.5 scales the X dimension to 50%)
        originalObject - the object from which omUnscaled was derived
        dimensionsScaled - the scene-dimensions when scaled to match scaleFactor
        bv - binary-values for creating the mask
        Returns:
        the scaled object-mask
        Throws:
        CreateException
